title: Soba noodles with julienned vegetables
ingredients: ['2 (250g) packets soba noodles', '4 tablespoons tamari or dark soy sauce, divided', '4 tablespoons sesame oil, divided', '1 tablespoon rice vinegar', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon chilli oil', '1 red pepper, julienned', '1 bunch spring onions, sliced', '2 carrots, julienned']
